p.4: Evolve is supporting a 10-person start-up hedge fund who are backed by one of the largest multi-manager platforms in the industry.
p.6: They are looking for a strong C++ Quant Developer to join them in NYC.
p.8: The team focuses on systematic strategies primarily trading macro-related instruments such as global stock index futures, bond futures, currencies, and commodities,
p.10: You will work closely with portfolio managers & researchers to build cutting-edge trading & research infrastructure, and to expand it to cover new products and markets. You will have the opportunity to work on the entire pipeline of technologies to manage market data, execution, simulation, data transformation, positions, and risk.
